name: Live jigsaw-epic puzzle game
description:
Enjoy the beautiful collection of puzzle games,and every level you’ll get a story that can effect you a lot.
Every photo is live and well-designed,I promise you will like them.

Features：
-Live photos for every level
-High quality and sweet music
-Well-designed photos
-Make your jigsaw into wallpaper

Is the fun of the jigsaw just a matter of quantity?
that's the reason why we designed this game.
This game combines many new ideas to allow you to experience a unique jigsaw puzzle in a relaxed environment.
We trust it will break the first impression of the previous jigsaw puzzle!

Support:
